Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2016...
Had first career hit on 5/22/2016, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/5/2016, off Kevin Nelson (CIN)...
Injured on 8/19/2016 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Atlanta to San Francisco on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: C Anton Santos, 2B Bruce Soloman. Going to ATL: C Eduardo Chavez, P William Hadfield)...
Injured on 8/12/2017 with a Bruised Hip, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/25/2018 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2019...
